name: Close Your Eyes (itch) (Henry Wheeler)
description:
Close Your Eyes is my submission to the February Brackeys game jam. The theme is "It is not Real". Close You Eyes is 2d sidescrolling platformer where you are able to close your eyes and have all that is not real disappear. I hope you enjoy. Please give feedback in the comments of this page.

Also a big thank you to both Burrsh and Gavin, two friends of mine who playtested the game. It was very much appreciated and helped bring up the quality of the product.
